feed.title: William Whitehouse
feed.subtitle: Games Programmer - C++, C#, Unity & Unreal 4. Currently studying Games Technology at UWE.

entry.title: Hello World!
entry.summary: Hello World! Welcome to my new website and first blog post! I’ve been wanting to start my own blog for a while now, but I have only just gained the courage to do so. My plan for these blog posts is to write about a new topic that I find interesting - this could be in the world of computer programming, computer hardware or something completely random (you’ll just have to wait and see).
